## MdMenuItemDirective.setActive() method

Sets active css class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setActive(cssClass: string, active?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cssClass | <code>string</code> | Css class to be set |
|  active | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether set as active |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
